long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change your browser font settings with the help of this extension. Follow the guidelines of how to use the extension.

1. Install extension on your browser.
2. After installing pin the extesnion on your browser
3. After pinning clcik on the extension icon and again click on "options".
4. After click on options you will go to the customize section of this extension. Just customize the font size according to your need.
